age.Description: Age of the participant at the date of acquisition

years_of_education.LongName: Number of years of full-time education of the participant
years_of_education.Description: The number of years the participant had spent in full-time education at the date of acquisition

active_motor_thresholds***.LongName: Active motor thresholds of the participant across sessions and hemispheres
active_motor_thresholds***.Description: The 4 active motor thresholds of the participant across sessions 01 and 02, and the right and left hemispheres.
active_motor_thresholds***.Format: [ses-01 right hemisphere, ses-01 left hemisphere, ses-02 right hemisphere, ses-02 left hemisphere]

task_order ***.LongName: Counterbalancing group for the behavioural tasks of the participant
task_order ***.Description: Counterbalancing group for the behavioural task of the participant, where visual/auditory represents which task modality block, and motion/stationary represents which subtask was presented first within each ABBA counterbalanced modality block.

Levels.auditory_motion: block 1 = auditory tasks, block 2 = visual tasks; each block containing 4 tasks in the ABBA order: motion, stationary, stationary and motion.
Levels.auditory_stationary: block 1 = auditory tasks, block 2 = visual tasks; each block containing 4 tasks in the ABBA order: stationary, motion, motion and stationary.
Levels.visual_motion: block 1 = visual tasks, block 2 = auditory tasks; each block containing 4 tasks in the ABBA order: motion, stationary, stationary, and motion.
Levels.visual_stationary: block 1 = visual tasks, block 2 = auditory tasks; each block containing 4 tasks in the ABBA order: stationary, motion, motion and stationary.

session_order ***.LongName: Counterbalancing group for tms and sham conditions, and the order of hemispheric stimulation
session_order ***.Description: The order of real or sham tms across sessions, and the order in which hemispheres were stimulated.

order_of_hemispheric_stimulation ***.LongName: Counterbalancing group for order of hemispheric stimulation
